title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Indoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Indoor Activities              Indoor Activities      The Obed Wild and Scenic River Visitor Center has several interpretive displays that tell the story of the cultural and natural history of the area, as well as the recreational elements that have made the river famous. A small bookshop is also located in thevisitor center, offering an assortment of titles, maps, postcards, etc. Each year, different special events are held inside the visitor center. Please click on the Schedule of Events icon for current information as to the dates and times that the events are offered.  Â     The Obed Wild and Scenic River Bookstore.
